amendment.description: Amendment ensures implementation of the EPA's Final Rule on the Disposal of Coal Combustion Residuals from Electric Utilities is consistent with Executive Order 12898.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in House Report 114-683 to ensure implementation of the EPA's Final Rule on the Disposal of Coal Combustion Residuals from Electric Utilities is consistent with Executive Order 12898.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
